scripts.start:dev: nodemon --watch src -e ts --exec 'NODE_ENV=development node --trace-warnings --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/app.ts'
scripts.start:queue:dev: nodemon --watch src -e ts --exec 'NODE_ENV=development node --trace-warnings --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/queues/worker.queue.ts'
scripts.start:queue:prod: nodemon --watch src -e ts --exec 'NODE_ENV=production node --trace-warnings --loader ts-node/esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/queues/worker.queue.ts'
